channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Grid Gallery – Photo Image Grid Gallery
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Grid Gallery – Photo Image Grid Gallery

item.title: CVE-2021-24529|2024-08-03T19:35:20.018Z -- unknown -- grid%20gallery%20%E2%80%93%20photo%20image%20grid%20gallery
item.description: The Grid Gallery – Photo Image Grid Gallery WordPress plugin before 1.2.5 does not properly sanitize the title field for image galleries when adding them via the admin dashboard, resulting in an authenticated Stored Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability.
